canonical-vid.description: The unique identifier for the merged contact in HubSpot's CRM.

vid-to-merge.description: The contact’s unique identifier to be merged.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the merge operation occurred.

entity-id.description: The entity identifier for the merged contact.

user-id.description: The user ID responsible for the merge operation.

num-properties-moved.description: The number of properties moved during the merge process.

merged_from_email.description: Details of the email address from which the contact was merged from.

source-vids.description: Array of unique identifiers of video sources.

updated-by-user-id.description: The user ID of the user who updated the email address.

source-label.description: The label of the source of the email address.

source-type.description: The type of the source of the email address.

source-id.description: The unique identifier of the source of the email address.

selected.description: Indicates if this email address was selected during the merge process.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the merge occurred.

merged_from_email_source-vids.description: Array of unique identifiers of video sources.

merged_from_email_updated-by-user-id.description: The user ID of the user who updated the email address from which the contact was merged from.

merged_from_email_source-label.description: The source label of the email address from which the contact was merged from.

merged_from_email_source-type.description: The source type of the email address from which the contact was merged from.

merged_from_email_value.description: The email address value from which the contact was merged from.

merged_from_email_source-id.description: The source ID of the email address from which the contact was merged from.

merged_from_email_selected.description: Indicates if the email address from which the contact was merged from was selected.

merged_from_email_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the email address merge.

merged_to_email.description: Details of the email address to which the contact was merged to.

updated-by-user-id.description: The user ID of the user who updated the email address.

source-label.description: The label of the source of the email address.

source-type.description: The type of the source of the email address.

source-id.description: The unique identifier of the source of the email address.

selected.description: Indicates if this email address was selected during the merge process.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the merge occurred.

merged_to_email_updated-by-user-id.description: The user ID of the user who updated the email address to which the contact was merged to.

merged_to_email_source-label.description: The source label of the email address to which the contact was merged to.

merged_to_email_source-type.description: The source type of the email address to which the contact was merged to.

merged_to_email_value.description: The email address value to which the contact was merged to.

merged_to_email_source-id.description: The source ID of the email address to which the contact was merged to.

merged_to_email_selected.description: Indicates if the email address to which the contact was merged to was selected.

merged_to_email_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the email address merge.

first-name.description: The first name of the merged contact.

last-name.description: The last name of the merged contact.
